settings.title: Record locking
settings.description: Configure optimistic/pessimistic locking and conflict handling.
settings.strategy_help_optimistic: Multiple users can edit at the same time; conflicts are checked on save.
settings.strategy_help_pessimistic: First editor acquires the lock and blocks concurrent edits until release.
settings.enabled_resources_placeholder: Add resource kind and press Enter
settings.enabled_resources_hint: Pick from suggestions or type a custom resource kind.
settings.allow_incoming_override_hint: Users still need the record_locks.override_incoming feature in their role or user ACL to keep their version during conflicts.

banner.locked_by_other: This record is currently locked by another user.
banner.optimistic_notice: Another user is editing this record. Conflicts may occur on save.
banner.same_user_session: This record is already open in another session.
banner.mine: You are currently editing this record.

errors.acquire_failed: Failed to load record lock status.
errors.force_release_unavailable: Force release is unavailable because takeover is disabled or the lock is no longer active.

conflict.title: Conflict detected
conflict.description: The record was changed by another user after you started editing.
conflict.override_blocked_notice: You cannot keep your version because you do not have permission to override incoming changes.
conflict.no_field_details: Field-level conflict details are unavailable for this record. Choose a resolution to continue.
conflict.accept_incoming_failed: Could not accept incoming changes. Refresh and try again.

lock_contended.title: Another user opened your record
lock_contended.body: Another user opened a record you are currently editing. Conflicts may occur on save.

lock_force_released.title: Your lock was force released
lock_force_released.body: Another user force released your lock on a record.

conflict_detected.title: Edit conflict detected
conflict_detected.body: Your save conflicted with a more recent change. Changed fields: {changedFields}.

conflict_resolved.title: Conflict resolved
conflict_resolved.body: A record conflict has been resolved.

incoming_changes.title: Incoming changes available
incoming_changes.body: This record was updated by another user. Changed fields: {changedFields}.
